alert.note: Alert for Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 6:32PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN ADAMS, SOUTHEASTERN FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, PIKE, NORTHEASTERN HIGHLAND, NORTHWESTERN SCIOTO AND ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 632 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Holland to near Peebles, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Circleville, Greenfield, Waverly, Piketon, Peebles, Kingston, Williamsport, Bainbridge, New Holland, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Logan Elm Village, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, Good Hope, Frankfort, Fox, Clarksburg and South Salem. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto
